wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Story Davis (25 May 1900 – 1988) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Accrington Stanley, Tranmere Rovers and Stoke.

response: * Sammy Davis (racing driver) (1887–1981), British journalist and motor racing driver
